data.description:
With access to hundreds of moments from professional games, you take to the virtual pitch, putting yourself in the boots of one 11 aside player. Scan the pitch at the right moments, make the correct passing decisions, and react to regular awareness tests, as you work to improve your vision by replicating situations from real games.

Whether you're looking to fit in more training hours from home, stay sharp when injured, or gain an advantage going into your next game, Be Your Best is designed for all players, both professional and amateur.

Be Your Best is a professional training tool and not a game. Improving your performance takes consistent practice and dedication over time.

changelog.change_log:
Updated awareness tests to focus on players in front of your field of view
Fixed issue where user was unable to select answers in awareness tests if the grip buttons were squeezed
Improved the scanning behaviour of non-user players
Fixed an issue where audio could hitch when buttons were pressed
Made locker room lights fade if dark mode is enabled
Made locker room lights dim when video is played

Improved goalkeeper behaviour
Improved shooting behaviour of players
Added Euros jersey colouring support
Fixed an issue where scan rate could be lower in scenarios with awareness tests
Fixed an issue where screen was black for Quest 3 users

Fixed an issue where pointers failed to appear in awareness tests
Fixed an issue where replays would not save correctly for quit sessions
Fixed an issue where too many players appeared in replay after quitting a session
Made pointers more visible

Added feedback in game for scanning, decisions and awareness performance
Added a settings screen to adjust audio volume and feedback settings

Fixed player kits not matching their position or teams
Fixed player skin tones not matching between head and body

Increased smoothness of simulation experience
Increase visual resolution
Reduced roughness of edges
Changed crowd appearance to remove flicking pixels and increase smoothness
Reduced instances where Matchplay would run at rapidly accelerated speeds.

Added ability to pause experience and exit to main menu by pressing the menu button on the left controller
Added ability to retry when network requests failed
Fixed an issue where setting the Meta OS to certain languages would affect the in app keyboard character options

Fixed an issue in Matchplay where goals were not being registered
Fixed an issue in Matchplay where no critical scans were being registered
Fixed an issue in Matchplay where no kicking sounds were playing
Fixed an issue where no sound would play in game after watching videos in bootcamp
Changed default gender to male for new users
Improved performance of app
Improved page transition animations in UI

Updated Career screen to more clearly show score targets and league progress
Updated Bootcamp to show instructional videos
Improved the speed of the BYBPRO mobile app
Fixed an issue in Matchplay where your selected field position did not match your position during play
Fixed an issue where Matchplay sessions would run at extremely fast speeds
Fixed an issue where Matchplay sessions could run indefinitely if the player did not act
Adjusted how transitions occur between set pieces in Matchplay to reduce visual glitches
Added new music tracks to the menu experience

Fixed a rare instance in scenario training where the ball would be not be received by players and be ignored for the remainder of the scenario
Fixed floating white jersey numbers appearing near the player after completing awareness tests
Fixed an issue where replays would not be available for viewing immediately after Matchplay sessions

The Activity history section has been updated in the VR experience. You can now browse your training history in a similar way to the mobile app, including watching replays from past sessions.

Fixed an issue where some training sessions were not contributing to career promotion.

Fixed an issue where the ball would collide incorrectly with the goals in scenario training, preventing scoring.

Updated the post-training results screen to match how results are displayed in the activity history.

Updated activity history to show match play sessions as distinct from practice sessions.

Fixed an issue where match play sessions showed as having rating rewards when they did not.

Replays are now saved to your profile and can be watched later, either in VR or in the mobile app
Added *Scan Rate*, *Scan Timing* and *Critical Scan* measurements to Matchplay
Matchplay sessions are now recorded as replays
Removed requirement for a training session to be fully completed in order for results to be recorded in training history

Added the ability perform a pass into space (through pass) in Matchplay.
Increased the spread of the players over the field in Matchplay.
Increased the width of wingers when attacking in Matchplay.
Made defenders press up the field further when attacking in Matchplay.
Made defenders pressure the player on the ball more aggressively in Matchplay.
Increased the amount of passing happening during play in Matchplay.
Adjusted the controls in Matchplay so that tackle (previously A button) and request ball (previously B button) are on the right grip button.

Fixed players not being positioned correctly in replays
Fixed inability to fly around in replay mode
Fixed grid overlay graphic appearing in replay mode
Fixed app lagging when playing a new scenario set after quitting a previous set
Fixed aiming line not appearing in scenarios when shooting
Fixed control hint for sprint action not appearing in Matchplay

Added an aiming line when holding down the shoot button
Fixed issues causing increased network traffic

Added ability to pause experience and exit to main menu by pressing the menu button on the left controller

Added ability to retry when network requests failed

Fixed an issue where setting the Meta OS to certain languages would affect the in app keyboard character options
